entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
